message:
Lately, there are a few posts asking about pieces of hardware. I found them "not exactly following the group rules" but as and admin I didn't really decide to delete them, specially that they were commented on by a few group members.
But, today is the second time I find one of these flagged by group remembers, i.e. it's not only me that find those posts on the fringes of being spam.
So, what should we do?
story: Shady M. Najib created a poll in Egyptian Geeks.

data.message: pieces of hardware? what do you mean?
Not spam, I think, just irrelative and should be deleted, because there is many other groups for this purpose.
People looking for computer hardware deals, or looking for specific computer hardware that they're not sure if it is available
Based on the fact that this group is for software only ... you seem to have a point
And one of the two posts I was talking about has just been deleted (not by me)

Shady M. Najib.. if u mean my post about GPs I got what I want and I can delete it.. but I don't think it's not related to the group reules.. I wasn't ask about the device itself ..I was asking about how it work.. ((  programmatically))
 ..thanx and plz tell me
nop, not your post Fatma :) Actually I didn't come across your post that you just mentioned.

It is called Egyptian Geeks, not Egyptian Web Developers, or People who write JS and call themselves geeks. A geek is someone interested in all things at least related to computers if not also electronics and robotics and gaming
Nop, Laptops and 3G to Hotspot devices and btw both are now deleted (again it's not me)
Samy, one of the post was asking for laptop deals. What's so geeky about that :D
no laptop deals or 3G deals or sales of any sort
